entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:02 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 1:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: SW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
